title: Samsung's 7M Parameter TRM: The AI That Proves Size Isn't Everything
description: Discover how Samsung SAIL Montreal's Tiny Recursive Model (TRM) achieves breakthrough AI performance with just 7 million parameters, challenging the bigger-is-better paradigm.
author: RADE AI Solutions

schema.headline: Samsung's 7M Parameter TRM: The AI That Proves Size Isn't Everything
schema.description: Samsung SAIL Montreal challenges AI industry norms with their Tiny Recursive Model (TRM), achieving breakthrough performance using just 7 million parameters and setting new benchmarks for AI efficiency.
schema.keywords: Tiny Recursive Model, TRM AI, Samsung SAIL Montreal, efficient AI models, 7 million parameters
